title: 11/03 Fantasy Football Podcast: Start or Sit (NFC), Watson Out, Zeke In!
description:
It has been a crazy week around the NFL with big trades and major injuries. We react to Deshaun Watson's injury at the top of the show and give you buy low and Waiver Wire QBs to add. Plus we discuss the values of Will Fuller and DeAndre Hopkins going forward ... BUF-NYJ recap (18:41), Beat the Waiver Wire for Week 10 (29:50) and we are surprised by the breaking Ezekiel Elliott news later in the show (44:00) ... ATL-CAR (33:15), TB-NO (41:00), WAS-SEA (46:28), DEN-PHI (52:44), ARI-SF (58:04), LAR-NYG (1:01:40) and daily Fantasy lineups ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
